short_description: before installation,make sure that edge of the wheel eyebrow has a sufficiently flat veneer.

Please refer to the instruction manual and installation video during installation. The product needs to be bent while sticking, and after installation, it is necessary to press firmly on every position to ensure that the double-sided tape is completely attached.

【Size】Product size: 23 feet [11.5FT*2pcs] long, 2.165 inches [5.5 centimeters] wide. Enough to fit all four wheels on most cars. It can be cut freely as required, and is applicable to most cars, SUVs and trucks.
【protect】To protect your car or truck from everyday driving damage,such as mud, dirt and scratches etc,to make your car look beautiful and gorgeous.It can also cover the original scratch of the car.

【Easy Installation】The product has good softness and plasticity. It does not require any tools. Remove the red protective film and paste it directly. It can be bent and pasted according to the radian of the wheel arch, and finally cut with scissors. After installation, press firmly on each position to make it more secure.

【durable】The products are made of high-quality rubber materials, with good flexibility and compression deformation capacity. It will not fade or deform under long-term ultraviolet radiation. The strong adhesive is firm and will not fall off, and will not leave sticky objects when tearing.
【After sales service】We guarantee this product for one year. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us.
